text:
No #Zinc

Supportive care + #chloroquine base arm: loading dose 600mg, then 300mg 12hrs later, then 300mg bid for 4days; total treatment 5days

Supportive care + #hydroxychloroquine arm: loading dose 400mg bid, then 200mg bid for 4days; total treatment 5days

Supportive care only https://t.co/66wwCWKTBn https://t.co/pbFq6UKCMt
